SELECT IF(a.wechat_name IS NULL,a.`name`,a.wechat_name) `name`, a.phone,a.buyer_user_id,c.distributor_name,c.distributor_phone, b.if_bind,b.update_time,b.distributor_id FROM cere_buyer_user a LEFT JOIN cere_distributor_buyer b ON a.buyer_user_id=b.buyer_user_id and b.shop_id=#{shopId} LEFT JOIN cere_shop_distributor c ON b.distributor_id=c.distributor_id where 1=1
and (a.wechat_name like concat('%',#{name},'%') OR a.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%'))
and a.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and c.distributor_name like concat('%',#{distributorName},'%')
and b.if_bind=#{ifBind}
and (b.if_bind=#{ifBind} OR b.if_bind IS NULL)
ORDER BY a.update_time DESC,a.create_time DESC
SELECT shop_id, if_invitation, bind_validity, validity_day, if_robbing, robbing_day, if_distribution_relationship from cere_shop_relationship where shop_id=#{shopId}
